metadata.title: CVE-2018-7866 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in newVar3 in util/decompile.c inlibming 0.4.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentation fault andapplication crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
